name: Bribery Bob
description:
Ever rob a museum? Most guys do it so wrong. They think they have to punch, kick, and shoot their way through when all it takes is a little money. Bribe and sneak your way through this stealthy puzzler!

This is my second game built from scratch in Java through Eclipse IDE. This was made for Mini-Jam 55 in 72 hours. The limitation was that there must be no violence so I made your primary defense method brown paper bags stuffed with cash! This time around I had a lot of help from friends and family on the graphics and music.

Deadly Roulette by Kevin MacLeod
Link: https://incompetech.filmmusic.io/song/3625-deadly-roulette
